root.name: Splatter Master
root.description: OverviewSplatter Master is a beat 'em up developed by Vingt-et-un Systems and published by both 505 Games (European release) and D3 Publisher (Japanese release) for the PlayStation 2 platform.In Japan the game is a part of the Simple 2000 series and is titled Simple 2000 Series Vol. 64: The Splatter Action.
